Reviews.Title: Alternate Source
Reviews.Author: Ctman2
Reviews.Content: Costco is selling the same chromebox now for $379..........this is a quality HP product that exploits all the strengths of Chrome OS.

Reviews.Title: Hp Chromebook with free wifi for life
Reviews.Author: Victoria Chandler
Reviews.Content: You can actually get the chromebook on the Hp website with free wifi (200MB per month) for life.  It's on the T-Mobile network.  Price is $349.

Reviews.Title: DITCH THE SHORT TERM FREE OTHER SITES HAVE VERY SIMILAR PRODUCT WITH FREE 4G FOR LIFE!!!! YES ITS TRUE EVEN HP.COM
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Free 4G can be if it if you have the patience ..I was lucky enough to allow myself some extra time looking at #s , in this case the product I.D and the site/store that I decide to purchase. For me HP can and often develops good stuff , my problem is more in the windows OS BLOAT BLOAT BLOATED, NOT THESE LIL BABY'S AND FAST BUT ABOUT THAT I.D # LOOk around their are different models (slightly) but I have found 4G FREE FOR LIFE AND I AM ABOUT TO COMPARE SPECS AND GET A GREAT DEAL THATS GONNA KEEP ON GIVING ,SO DITCH THE 2YEAR PLAN AND SEARCH OUT THE LIFE LONG PRESENT TO YOURSELF OR A GOOD FRIEND CUZ WE ALL KNOW FREE WILL NOT LAST LONG this will never be offered again I'm quite blown away by this amount of free service gonna take good care of this piece of equipment just so I feel like chrome pays my phone bill every month year after year cuz they love me lol yeah right

Reviews.Title: Free WiFi???  Dont kid yourself!
Reviews.Author: OKBranigan
Reviews.Content: You  have paid for that first two years "Free" WiFi in the much higher price of this device. Remember, they are giving you that WiFi at THEIR minimal pre profit price, then after two years what are you going to pay for WiFi service?  The device is has good specs and is probably fine since HP makes good stuff, but don't be deceived by misleading advertising.You ain't getting nuthin free in the business world!!
